info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 12:26AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN CHARLTON COUNTY THROUGH 100 AM EDT... At 1225 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Homeland, or near Folkston, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts around 40 mph, pea size hail, excessive cloud-to-ground lightning, and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Folkston, Homeland, Race Pond, and Winokur. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
